violations.description: Choice mergeability violation: Role "B1" participates in choice branches [branch1] but not in [branch2]. After a choice, all roles must have a consistent view of the protocol state. Either include "B1" in all branches with equivalent actions, or remove it from all branches. Branch participation: {"branch1": {B3, Seller, B1, B2}, "branch2": {B3, Seller}}.

Choice mergeability violation: Role "B2" participates in choice branches [branch1] but not in [branch2]. After a choice, all roles must have a consistent view of the protocol state. Either include "B2" in all branches with equivalent actions, or remove it from all branches. Branch participation: {"branch1": {B3, Seller, B1, B2}, "branch2": {B3, Seller}}.

warnings.description: Multicast message from Seller to [B1, B2, B3] - verify all receivers handle message
Multicast message from Seller to [B1, B2, B3] - verify all receivers handle message
